attributes.action: Restructuring of parliamentary procedures and policies
attributes.additional_details: The parliamentary system worked for centuries as people were reliant on a representative for a specific region. We are living in a smaller world where communication is much more accessible for UKcitizens. We need to change the way our country is handled by the few and give it back to the many.
attributes.background:
A complete reformat of our governing system to address the wants of the people.

We are living in a time where public communication is easy and accessible. We no longer need parliamentary representatives when we can all share our views instantly.

Time to move forward with democracy.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what specific changes you'd like to see to the way that the UK Parliament works.
